alert.note: Alert for Fergus (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:42PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Fergus County through 715 PM MDT... At 642 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Moore, or 13 miles west of Lewistown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Glengarry and Hilger. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 72 and 86. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
